definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
wholly foreign-owned enterprise (WFOE) (form of legal entity in China)/abbr. to 外資企業|外资企业[wai4 zi1 qi3 ye4]
pinyin: wai4 shang1 du2 zi1 qi3 ye4
wai4 shang1 zhi2 jie1 tou2 zi1

sentences.english: II. 199 foreign business invested commercial enterprises need to make rectifications after sorting out.
sentences.chinese: 经过清理需要进行整改的外商投资商业企业199家。

sentences.english: Does tax preference transition period exist when foreign-funded enterprises deposit additional funds.
sentences.chinese: 外商投资企业追加投资是否存在税收优惠过渡期？

sentences.english: Stanely:Maybe if there are more foreign investments, there will be more regulations to protect foreign investors.
sentences.chinese: 我想或许外资一多，就会有规范来保障外商吧。

sentences.english: Strengthen BASIC infrastructure construction and improve the hard investment environment.
sentences.chinese: 加强基础设施建设，努力改善外商投资的“硬环境”。

sentences.english: Offer standard workshop for foreign-invested project.
sentences.chinese: 为外商投资项目提供标准厂房。

sentences.english: A: I worked in a foreign rep office for one year.
sentences.chinese: 我是在一个外商代理处工作了一年。

sentences.english: This is a company specialized in producing all kinds of bags of wholly foreign-owned enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是一家专业生产各种包袋的外商独资企业。

sentences.english: BATT Consulting Services Company was set up in 2002.
sentences.chinese: BATT咨询服务公司是一家外商独资企业。

sentences.english: These Measures shall not be applicable to the foreign-invested projects and overseas investment projects.
sentences.chinese: 外商投资和境外投资项目不适用本办法。

sentences.english: So what kind of Italian coffee should you order in a caffe?
sentences.chinese: 所以你要什么样的义大利咖啡，在外商秩序？

sentences.english: Actually manage the existing foreign-invested enterprises well.
sentences.chinese: 切实办好现有外商投资企业。

sentences.english: May a foreign-funded enterprise reduce its registered capital during the period of operation ?
sentences.chinese: 外商投资企业在经营期限内可以减少注册资本吗？

sentences.english: Paid-in foreign direct investment reached $. billion.
sentences.chinese: 实际利用外商直接投资亿美元。

sentences.english: Anchi Auto Brake (Shenzhen) Co. , LTD is located in SHENZHEN South China, established in 1994.
sentences.chinese: 我们公司成立于1994年，是一家外商独资企业。

sentences.english: Other behaviors of making things difficult for foreign-investment enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 其他刁难外商投资企业的行为。

sentences.english: FIPB had kept the proposal pending for over a year.
sentences.chinese: 外商投资促进局把这个提议搁置了一年。

definition: abbr. for 外商獨資企業|外商独资企业[wai4 shang1 du2 zi1 qi3 ye4]
